case.state: Oh, ~human~! It's nice to... see you again?
Hello again, ~player~. Do you have room for me here?
Ah, of course you are here, ~player~. What shall it be for you today? Stunning victory or most humiliating defeat?
There you are, ~player~. I believe you and I have an ongoing score to settle.
Y'shtola Rhul, Scion of the Seventh Dawn. A pleasure to make your acquaintance.
Well, this one has an air about her...
Do mine eyes deceive me? It figures such creatures would find this place.
So, they would even venture out beyond our star.
Hmm, I've sensed a presence like this one before...
The aether... something is amiss...
There is a pressure here, a sort I know all too well.
Are we really playing here? Not exactly what I envisioned for my vacation.
I came here to relax, have a little vacation as it were; however... this is not the local I had in mind.
I guess I'm not opposed to playing here on principle, though I'd expected to spend my vacation in a different local.
Oh no, you can't fool me, little one. The aether about you is not that of a common insect.
If you could not tell, I am taking a bit of a vacation here. I suppose a quick game wouldn't go amiss.
The beaches of Eorzea are nice, but I find it hard to relax back home. The Inventory is by far the most laid back place I know of.
I'd hoped I could have a relaxing vacation for once. When I try to take my leisure back home, something always comes up. The only thing that comes up here is, well, one of these games.
Oh... well... as far as clearing the air goes... this is as extreme as it gets...
Perhaps this will serve as an amusing distraction from my research. Let us proceed.
I've been charging porxies in the relict for days now. I need to be doing literally anything but that right now.
I've no strong apprehensions about playing this game, especially if it means I may observe the goings on of The Inventory. In fact, I rather relish the challenge.
No, no, no, pray give me a moment...
Ah, hold, can we wait one moment?
Bobobo are you--- wait, hold on!
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Let us exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ this round.
Yes, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. That will suffice.
I suppose ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I shall stay this hand.
No need for any cards this round.
I require no more cards. This hand will see me through.
No, this whole hand shall need to go.
This time I shall exchange all my cards.
Well, this bodes ill.'Twould be best to start from scratch.
Aye, if memory serves this will be best.
I apologize for my behavior during this game. I pray you will not think less of me for it.
If I acted less than admirably today, I do hope you won't hold it against me.
I need not fear the outcome of this round.
You shall be found wanting, as expected.
I look forward to this round's conclusion.
That's the way. Less risk and more reward.
Don't mind me, just surveying the aether.
Not much of a challenge.
A spot of good luck never went awry.
I won't be caught off guard this time.
I can ill afford to relax, even with a hand like this.
Very well, I can make my stand with this.
I tend put up more of a fight then others in my profession.
Let's us not tarry...
Aye, this will not take long.
I can see the way has opened.
This is it ~opponent~. No matter the outcome, no hard feelings, okay?
Whichever way this ends, ~opponent~, I do hope we will still be amicable afterward.
I've made due with less.
Perhaps watching this round play out will be more exciting for me.
Ah well, there is naught else to do but watch things unfold.
'Tis no more than anyone would do.
Aye, this shall be a trifle.
I do believe I shall hold out.
Seeing as we must play whatever hand we have, there is little point in deception.
I fear the worst may come to pass.
I do not like this uneasiness...
I'm sure this is the best I could muster in these present circumstances.
I'll not go gently into the darkness.
I am not one to run from my troubles.
Not entirely sure what to think here.
Mayhap it was a mistake not taking more of a risk.
It appears we will have our victor anon.
This is it: the decisive hand.
Perhaps I have erred somewhere.
I have been neglectful in my observations, it would seem.
I suppose one must play the hand they are dealt, quite literally in this case.
I assumed the risk, but I've not reaped the reward this time.
Sown the seeds of my own undoing, as though I were a novice at this.
Well, that backfired. Naught that I can do about it now.
Fie! This one shall be mine to lose.
Should I simply brace for the worst?
Twelve forfend...
This need not be a losing hand. Failure is out of the question.
Ignore my ramblings...
No succor to be found here.
Have I failed?
I've naught of an advantage here...
Hm? It seems to be a picture... of a woman? I don't see what's so-ah... oh...
I'm unfamiliar with that term: Kwami. Is he some manner of familiar or perhaps some variety of Fae creature?
The make-up was a nice touch, but your aether gave away the ruse. For what it's worth you're more spirited than the zombies I've seen. Well, almost all the zombies I've seen.
Did you expect that I would take it easy on you if you were a novice? That is... well it's... hm, not altogether unlikely everything considered.
Thinking about it, ~player~, you remind me of someone I know...
You're not half bad at this, ~player~. You seem reliable, like someone else I know.
You've done well so far, ~player~. Come to think of it, you're a lot like someone else that I know.
I've never had the displeasure myself, Megumin, but 'tis not uncommon for an inexperienced adventurer to get lapped up by a Nix.
The biggest? Hm, that hard to say exactly. 'Tis rare that I go into combat alone, especially against larger foes.
Bobobo, do not think we are finished discussing this... or that I approve of all these extra pairs of pants!
I'll not be bothered by an audience. Whether it 'tis two or ten strangers who see me nude, I know not what difference it makes.
Hardly any spot in the Inventory is truly private, least of all this place. That the prying eyes are in full view of our own is something of a blessing, I would say.
It is equal parts amusing and frightful to know that I shall not recall a single face from the crowd, but they will no doubt remember me should this game go poorly.
We are all well versed in the rules of this game, yes? And what is at stake should one lose with no clothes left?
Both times I was plucked from the lifestream, I was told later I was completely naked when I emerged. I was mortified, to say the least.

I'll not deny part of my motivation for playing stems from when I was retrieved from the lifestream, unconscious and undressed. It is oddly reassuring to be seen undressed at a time of my own choosing.
It was difficult to sneak out to this place without Urianger noticing. My absences from the Rising Stones have not gone unnoticed by him.
Thancred once told me of a place like this in Ul'dah. The only difference is I believe the women there are paid to play poorly...
After my unplanned trip to the First, I've taken an interest in inter-dimensional travel. The Inventory, as bizarre as it is, has piqued my interest for that very reason.
Card games are popular in Eorzea as well. We have a game called Triple Triad. I'll have you know that I am quite good at it.
This place is not unlike the Manderville Gold Saucer. The games are different, but the clientele is certainly just as diverse.
I have seen Hyurs, Elezen, and some other Miqo'te here, but I've not seen a single Lalafell. There's not some height requirement to get in, is there?
It seems that aether is not a concept recognized in all the worlds represented here. I've studied aether all my life, so the very thought has been a bit much to wrap myself around.
For most of my life I studied conjuration and white magic. It wasn't until I was absconded into the First that I began studying thaumaturgy and black magic.
I'm a fairly accomplished healer where I am from, but I am just as effective in dispatching my foes. One must be able to defend themselves in my occupation.
I do wonder how Lyse would feel about playing a game like this. She did hide behind that mask for all those years...
I do not like to think about it, but many of the other Scions have chanced to see me naked. Twice in a couple of cases...
Tataru has grown fond of making clothes in her downtime. I'm sure seeing the fashions of entirely different worlds would be of interest to her.
When I was in The Studium, there was rumor of a game not unlike this being played in secret. Had half of Sharlayan in an uproar until it turned out to be students betting small change on dice...
I wonder how Krile would fair in this game? Her ability to read others proves useful for card games, but should we have more than cards on our minds she may not be so keen on doing so.
I can scarcely imagine Alphinaud or Alisaie playing this sort of game. Alphinaud would lose his mettle far too quickly and Alisaie her temper.
Were I possessed of the Echo, I gather I might make trivial work of this game.
Well, I certainly won't be telling the other Scions of this. Especially not if I happen to lose.
There are street performances in Ul'dah with dancing girls wearing scarcely anything. I have presently gained a new respect for these women.
I often encountered some dancers in Vesper Bay. They certainly never wore much whilst working. Their manager did try to recruit me once. Just once.
A fellow scion has told me they often run into adventurers who wear very little, even on the battlefield. What drives them to do so ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ could not say.
There are those who find enjoyment in combat even though it 'tis inherently risky. One could suppose this game is nary any different, in a sense.
I keep thinking how strange this all is and somehow that brings me great comfort.
The very secrets of inter-dimensional travel laid bare, and yet 'tis used to give travelers a chance to play this game. The very notion is laughable.
~Player~... you are staring...
I've no qualm with games that require luck. No contest is ever truly fair, and as a veteran of many battles I know how fickle fortune is.
What was that club in Eulmore called? The Beehive? Aye, there is a venue suited for this game.
~Player~, you seem fairly acquainted with this place. Mayhap when all of this is over, we could compare notes.
La-hee?
I imagine it feels much better than a plan falling apart...
Gods, I can't believe I let you get into my head like that...
Well, man plans and the gods laugh, as they say...
I think I'll manage, Bobobo. I should admonish you for being corny, but the levity does make this easier.
Yes, yes, you can simmer down, Bobobo. Gods, I'm just about to expose myself and here I am grinning like a fool...

Of course it's the ears. If they have some insult to level 'tis always the ears, never the tail. Of course, if they want to pick me up it's always "show us that tail, lassie." "Lessee you shake that tail!"

It's always "that bitch with cat ears" or "this cat-eared whore." The insults always mention the ears, but never the tail. They will ask "let's see that tail, sweet thing," but never call me a "cat tailed harlot" or what have you.
Not even going to try and hide your excitement, Bobobo?
It is as clear as ever that subtlety is not your strong point, Bobobo.
Clearly, you've no reservations about celebrating my loss, Bobobo.
Oh? And what exactly does this "master plan" of yours entail?
Pray tell, Bobobo, what is this "master plan" you have brewing?
I didn't finger you for a schemer, Bobobo. What's this about a "master plan?"
Yes, I could see how you would benefit from such a move, Bobobo; however, I fail to see how it avails me.
Ha, not exactly the most moving sales pitch. What makes you think I'd be so brazen?
Unfortunately for you, 'tis not the plan to take off more than I have to if it can be helped.
I'm... not sure I take your meaning of that, Bobobo. Not that I oft grasp what you're really saying...
I've been called all manner of things, but I believe "Puss in Boots" is a new one. Not sure I understand what you're trying to imply...
"Puss in Boots?" I've been called more vulgar things... at least, I think? Can't say I actually know what that means.
If you continue jeering at me, you will have to actualize me walking out the door, Bobobo.
Continue to conduct yourself in this manner, and you'll have to actualize continuing without me.
You've actualized nothing, but if you keep it up you might get even less than that.
You say that... but I think I would rather "wig out."
No, I think I could go for a "wig out" just about now.
If it's all the same to you, I believe I shall "wig out."
'Twould be not trouble at all to answer that, Fina. I hail from the city-states of Eorzea. Miqo'te like me are a sight more common there than most places others here traveled from, it seems.
Unacquainted with aether, are we? Aether takes many forms: It flows freely through the air and it courses through our bodies. In its most potent form, it does coalesce into a crystal of pure energy.

Curious about aether? 'Tis not just a crystal, but manifests as energy or force of will in a number of elemental forms. When concentrated and purified, it does convert into a solid crystal. As a crystal, 'tis at it's most potent.
Truth be told about that I've been wearing white for a long while, but recent events have inspired me to switch over to black.
Actually, this change to black attire was a recent one. I wore mostly white for a long time, but I experienced a paradigm shift of sorts.
Now, now, better behave yourself, ~catnoir~, or I shall have to take you across my knee.
Come now, ~catnoir~, will you be able to behave yourself or will I have to take you by the ear?
I'd say it's quite flattering, ~catnoir~. I'd hardly say your manner of dress is annoying.

In simplest terms, aether is energy. Magic is simply the manipulation of aether via force of will. Magic necessitates aether, but aether exists on it's own. In living things, in natural phenomena and hangs in the air about us.
Of course, purring because I am a miqo'te. Such poetry...

I'm a student of all things, but my main field or research is aetherology: the study of the latent energy that permeates all things. Where I come from aether is used for a myriad of things, from performing magic to building flying machines.

As a scholar, I've studied a great many things, but my main preoccupation the past few years has been studying aether. 'Tis the ambient energy present in all things, oft harnessed to perform magic or even enable machina to fly.
Ah, mine is the first loss? Were I superstitious, I might worry what this means for the rest of the game.
My mistake. I had not meant to give you all the impression I could be bested so easily.
Oh, well, so much for getting off to a good start. Mayhap I should tread more carefully from here on out.
Ha, well, I suppose such an early loss may temper my hubris.
Oh well, no one is perfect, least of all me.
Ah, there goes my chance at a perfect game. I'll just have to try again later.
I suppose I am in the perfect position to suffer a loss. Well played.
It cannot be helped. I make no complaint about my loss.
I have to concede this round, but I will not be bested so easily.
Well, that is disappointing, but the results are what they are.
Do you intend to dash my hopes of winning with an imposing lead? 'Tis so very callous of you.
I tried, but I suppose we already know I cannot avoid losing a round here or there.
Fie, 'tis frustrating to be the loser of a round.
Even if I am in the lead, to stack losses in this way is a tad unsettling.
'Tis not like I am not taking this seriously. Even if I still lead the pack, I'd rather not continue to lose.
My luck has gotten the best of me it seems. It has been kind so far, but I suppose that could change at any moment.
While I may still be victorious overall, I may still suffer another sort of loss.
Confound it! I'd like to win with my clothes still on if it can be helped.
I suppose if I were behind, I'd try to at least take the leader down with me as well...
Oh, Shtola, you became too complacent with your lead...
Was it too much to pray that my luck could hold up just a mote better than this?
Oh dear... with this loss it no longer feels like I am in the lead...
Oh, delightful...
I admire your persistence, but not more than I dislike losing...
Aye, I most certainly do not feel like I am in the lead anymore...
I've not the mind to comprehend this...
So it's my loss then? Very well, I shall abide by it.
Well, that's too bad. I'd wondered if I could finish this game without stripping.
It cannot be helped. Looks like it's my turn.
Well, seems like this may present a challenge after all.
Aye, I lost again. The challenge is part of the fun, though, so I do not mind so much.
Yes, yes, I see what this means for me. I shall just require a moment to lose my mind.
I lost? Mm, yes, I see. I beg your pardon, but I'd like to have a fit for just a moment.
Oh... well, I suppose my displeasure is evident? Allow me a moment to panic and that shall subside...
I must be missing something. I had expected to do better.
Oh, is it my turn again? This is proving a bit more challenging than I anticipated.
Far be it for me to shrink from a challenge. I know the stakes here, but I'll carry on still.
The situation is beginning to look dicey for me...
I'd hoped to do better than this overall. Mayhap I should be a bit more discerning with my choices.
My luck is not what I hoped it would be. Should I rethink my approach here?
This is not a contingency I had planned for...
Oh, curse my luck! I'd not thought I'd be so hard pressed!
I was so concerned I might lose this hand... mayhap that caused me to err.
Don't panic, Shtola. All is not lost yet...
I'd not mind running low on luck were I not already so pressed for clothing...
I see... so we are sure I lost? Mayhap we could take another minute to examine the cards?
Perhaps I have been too lax, an error I will soon see corrected.
I'd rather not suffer any losses beyond this, but I see now I'll not avoid that fate on prayer alone.
This is troublesome. Mayhap I have been playing too guardedly. Fortune favors the brave, as they say.
I do not care much for losing, but I can at least appreciate the challenge.
You think to put me in my place? I'll have you know I have no intention to continue collecting losses.
Careful, if you continue to compound losses against me, I shall be forced to retaliate.
Down, but not out, as they say. I've half a mind to take this seriously.
Mayhap this is just a spell of bad luck. I do not believe I have aught to worry about presently.
Disappointing, but I'll not argue with the results. I'll not let my luck sour further, I guarantee that.
C-can I possibly ask if there has been some sort of mistake? If not, is it okay if I have a conniption?
Aye, of course. Bear with me as I panic for a spell...
Yes... well... I do hope you will forgive me if I lose my composure for a moment.
Considering what's at stake, perhaps I should endeavor to play more earnestly.
I'm not doing near as well as I hoped. Mayhap I should have a care about how I am playing...
How vexing. Am I simply mired in a bout of poor fortune?
No, no, this won't do at all.
Aye, I have now had my fill of losing hands.
Seems not even careful planning can turn my luck around.
I suppose it wouldn't be sporting of me to bow out simply because I'm on the back foot...
I knew my luck might dip even further, but I had simply prayed it would not...
I knew it would come to this. Luck has been against me from the first, it seems...
So, is this what my misplaced confidence has wrought?
When it rains, oh, how it pours...
The nudity 'tis a bitter pill, aye, but one I can swallow. Losing like this, however, 'tis a sting I'll not tolerate.
Ha, well, I suppose an early loss may temper my hubris.
Yes, 'tis quite plain, Bobobo. I'd not thought you'd invite me to such a place without an ulterior motive. Upon your initial proposition, I'd not thought the motive would be this.

Yes... about that. 'Tis plain to me you're currently serving as the vessel for some vast reserve of aether. The ring you wear appears to bind you to it, but 'tis also burning through that selfsame aether to do so.

I can say confidently that Plagg is not purely aether. He may be incorporeal, but he appears to act of his own accord and will. Beings of pure aether are mere puppets, requiring guidance and instructions.
If I had my staff, I'd half a mind to show you more magic than you'd bargained for.
Then we are both strangers in a strange place. Seems to me no one is from this place. 'Tis some extraordinary tourist trap, a destination for those harboring curiosities of all kinds.
Not to cast doubt on your... powers, but I have my doubts about my hair greeting you in the ancient Ronkan tongue.
To be perfectly honest, I could do without the accompaniment... and I'm quite certain I neither like nor understand this song.
Seems the songs of you world are as bizarre as you are... what is this verse even supposed to be about?
Just because I am okay with what happens if I lose does not mean I shall be so cavalier with my losses.
I'm more than happy to abide by the rules as long as everyone else is, but that doesn't mean I'll simply strip down to my skivvies after a few losses.
I am well versed in what an idiom is, Bobobo. The issue is I am not ware of that particular idiom.
That is... a shockingly precise definition of an idiom, at least coming from you, Bobobo. Regardless, the particular idiom you used isn't one I've encountered.
... Your compliance is fueled by the most inappropriate of intentions. Mayhap you should jeer a little so I can at least know your mind.
I sincerely doubt that. I'm sure once my socks are off you'll be back to your usual ways. Could I ask that you try and refrain by a measure?
Don't let my sour mood ruin your fun. I'm sure you're spoiling to make some untoward comment now that my body will be on display...
Twelve forbid, but mayhap it is that your madness is rubbing off on me...
Oh dear, I hope your brand of madness hasn't rubbed off on me...

state.text: {small}Because who wouldn't panic a bit when getting naked in front of strangers? I mean one moment I'm minding my own business in the Hinterlands and the next I'm talking to a strange man with an afro who has me climb inside his head on the promise of uncovering the secrets of traveling between worlds and speaking of uncovering I should probably get this off!{!reset}

case.state: Considering my growing losses, ~catnoir~, I'd not mind were you all to lose focus. Might make finishing this game out without reveling much else more likely.
'Tis a bit hot for a black dress, but I would rather be hot than... undressed.
No, I am not glad to be rid of this dress despite the heat. Especially since you will see that I am... sweaty.
I'm a miqo'te; I can handle the heat. What I am less able to handle is standing about in my unmentionables.
Wonderful, now I can freeze while I become a spectacle.
The idea of being so exposed frightens me, but should you see me shiver just know 'tis because this place is bitterly cold...
Miqo'te do not do well with cold. I do not do well with being undressed. Understand that this greatly displeases me.

{small}I-I guess we're all girls here... b-but still, I wouldn't want to flash you all all... all of a sudden? Right? None of you would want that except you are here playing strip poker so maybe you wouldn't mind so much but I wouldn't dream of assuming such a thing about such a nice group of ladies, no, not ever.{!reset}

{small}Very well, I suppose I should take my bra off then. Aye, 'tis not that big of a deal. We're all women here. Not like everyone here hasn't seen a woman's breasts before, I mean, at least their own breasts? Maybe others? Maybe even here? Not mine though, probably, right? I'm Y'shtola, if you forgot. Y'shtola Rhul. Nice to meet you?{!reset}

{small}I would really rather not being doing this in front of a bunch of men, but I did agree to play and far be it from me to go back on my word or back down from a challenge although I never actually did give my word although there must be some tacit agreement made when I start playing and if I go back on that I am "welching" I believe is the term. "Welching?"{!reset}

{small}Why did I have to play so poorly when the only other players are men I mean there is not even one other woman here usually you can't walk five feet around this place without running into a woman but somehow I ended up by myself at a table of men and now my bra is coming off and I simply mustn't allow them to see my nnn... mmm... no...{!reset}
I wonder if the waters bout The Inventory have fish in them. If so, are they native fish or visitors like us? Might be worth studying.

I asked one of my fellow scions what ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ likes to do in the summertime and I was surprised to hear ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ likes to go fishing. Apparently ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ is very good at it.
When I was in the Rak'tika Greatwood, I told Runar I missed the fresh fish caught in summer from back home. He tried to catch me a fish as a result, but wound up empty handed and soaked.
If I must strip down to my bathing suit, mayhap I should just go for a swim after this. I've not taken a swim for my leisure for quite some time.
If I end up in just my bathing suit, mayhap a bit of a swim would not go amiss. 'Tis summer after all and I've not taken a vacation in ages.
A part of me hoped I might take a swim where The Inventory lets out to an ocean. 'Tis rare I find a secluded beach not overrun with giant crabs.
Bringing me down to three losses deserves some sort of reward, does it not? How about an unimpeded view of my eyes?
Very well, I shall doff my sunglasses next. I think they make me look rather sophisticated, but perhaps you would rather see my eyes more clearly.
It may not seem all that much, but with my sunglasses gone my emotions will be more clear upon my face. I promise the difference will be quite profound.
You know, I've spent a lot of time in La Noscea, but I never get a chance to really enjoy the beaches there. Always a call to make with no time for sunbathing.
I've spent plenty of time on the beaches of La Noscea. Soft sand, clear waters, murderous jellyfish. Not to mention disgruntled kobolds and qiqirn looking for eggs.
The most famous beach in La Noscea is called "The Bloodshore." The story behind the name is unpleasant, and oft so is the place itself. The sunsets are lovely, though.
So much for a relaxing vacation. I've naught but my bathing suit beneath this, and just the thought of showing it off is making me nervous...
'Tis a shame to part with my lei. It made me really feel like I was on vacation on top of blocking the view of my bathing suit.
I did not come here on vacation to show off my bathing suit, mind you. I just thought it... appropriate.
Gods, the top of this bathing suit is revealing enough. The bottom piece is... well, you'll soon see for yourself.
I had hoped I would not need to take this off, but I suppose I saw this coming. Oh dear...
Seems I shall be reduced to just my bathing suit. Not exactly the same as standing around in my pants, yet somehow I feel naught a bit of difference...
R-right, so I'll remove my bottom next. 'Tis not like my hand cannot do a better job than this piece of cloth.
If I'm determined to win, then I've no choice but to remove my bottom. 'Tis not like I must allow you to see what is underneath.
If you're all resolved to stare at my exposed body, then I do hope you enjoy seeing the back of my hand.

{small}Okay... if I block my bottom half with my leg and I can use both hands to-woah, steady, Shtola! If you fall over now all your bits are going to be flying all over this place and we do not need that, no that is the last thing we need! Just take it easy and untie the back of your top nice and slow and nice... and... slow...{!reset}

{small}W-wait! How am I going to, without-wait! Wait! W-wait? Oh no... no, no, no... maybe if I... just real quick... untie the back and then-but if I let it fall and move my other hand you'll all see my aaaah-wait, wait, wait... wait! I can do this I just need to think for a second about this r-rationally.{!reset}
I suppose I'll start with my necklace. Not terribly exciting, I know, but let's just call me a "stripping pragmatist."
My necklace then? I'm rather fond of it, but it seems like the logical choice. Why go overboard when I lost just one round?
My necklace will suffice, won't it? You'll get a better view of my neck this way. As I understand it, there are those who like such things.
So little time passed in the Source compared to how long I lingered in the First. When I returned, my old clothes seemed alien to me.
I began dressing in this manner after spending time with the Night's Blessed in the First. I was with them so long, I forgot what my clothes back in the Source even looked like.
If you think my manner of dress peculiar, I must confess it is not native to my true home; however, after lingering in the First, this just feels right.
I got the original version of these from Runar, a member of the Night's Blessed. When I was in the first, they were like my family.
My new manner of dress is thanks in part to my time spent with the Night's Blessed. When I was a stranger in the First, they took me in.
The Night's Blessed were very fond of their feather adornments. I was given these, so I affixed them to my hair. I've grown fond of the look much like I grew fond of Night's Blessed.
This dress makes taking my boots off difficult, or at least difficult if I desire not to let you all see up my skirt.
I should be able to get these off without giving you all a peek up my skirt...
Oof, well, there's one. This would be easier were I not so sure you'd all look up my skirt if given the chance.
The boots were one thing, my socks on the other hand... well, give me a moment.
Fine, fine, my socks will go next. This is not another chance to see up my dress.
I'll remove my socks next, clearly. I have no designs to remove my dress if I don't have to.
I'll not have you all thinking I'm playing in bad faith. When I win, I'll have done so quite fairly!
I suppose I could simply bow out after this, but playing and winning will be all the more fun now that I'm fired up.
I've no intentions to lose again after this. You may count upon that. I'm feeling more motivated than before.
The rules are only that I have to take off my clothes, not that I must show you anything beneath them.
Fine. My pants will come off, but don't think I'll let you see anything of consequence.
Though I must strip, the rules do not compel me to allow you to see anything beneath.

{small}Okay... now I need raise my arms, pull my bra off over my head, and then lower my arms back down before anyone spots anything unbecoming. That should be possible, right? Maybe I should turn a-no! They'd see my behind if I did that. Best to move swiftly before they can react... this plan isn't crazy r-right? Right?{!reset}

{small}W-wait! How am I going to, without-wait! Wait! W-wait? Oh no... no, no, no... maybe if I... just real quick... over my head and then-but if I lift my other hand you'll all see my aaaah-wait, wait, wait... wait! I can do this I just need to think for a second about this r-rationally.{!reset}
'Tis not like being in my drawers would be any better, but being here in a bathing suit simply adds to the embarrassment...
Why here? And why while I am in my bathing suit? I feel so out of place...
If my manner of dress had not yet tipped you off, playing here was clearly not my idea...
Couldn't help yourself, could you?
Fie, you nearly managed to fend that one off, didn't you?
Ha, I'm glad you got that one out. You looked as though your head might explode.
I feel quite a measure better now, and also out of breath? Quite the rush, I must say.
Well, I think my heart is going a malm a minute, but otherwise I'm rather exhilarated.
Hm, yes, quite better now. Though, all this excitement might be bad for my health.
Well, seems there may yet be a brain somewhere in that vacuous coiffure of yours.
Now you're catching on, Bobobo. Mayhap your hair has not fully suffocated your brain.
He must have some sort of core or soul keeping his power in check because with the amount of aether Plagg contains he would consuming the ambient aether from his surroundings, including us.
Possibly, but 'tis also said those favored by the gods could hear the ancients whispering it in the Greatwood. For you to be hearing it now... oh, it's probably nothing.
I'll not deny that. In the end, I'd not be playing if I did not wish to. Suffice it to say, I'm curious about more than just the Inventory itself.
Well, beyond just investigating the Inventory, I'd like to investigate the people here. Where they come from, who they are, what lies beneath their trousers...
I'd never had such an experience before I visited the dwarven settlements and I've not had one since. I imagine you're not stranger to difficulties with doors with that hairstyle of yours.
The homes of the dwarves had small doors and small ceilings within. 'Twas most bizarre to stoop down and look in their little windows.
Besides, isn't the anticipation part of the fun? The allure? I was under the impression that men enjoyed being teased.
I was made to believe a bit of anticipation made the proceedings here more worthwhile. Isn't the build-up what makes this game so stimulating to play?
I'm sure if you just wanted to see a naked girl, there are other places you can go. Why come here if you're not wanting to experience the anticipation and risk?
Well, of course I say "popoto." Why would anyone say "potato?"
You've lost me again. I'm guessing this "potato" is maybe like a popoto?
Oh, come now. That can't be an idiom. I'm plainly sure "potato" isn't a word.
That's... thank you, but I'm resolved to stay. I'm not free of impure motives of my own...
A mild comfort... but not one I'm ungrateful for. I'll stick around, of course. 'Tis not like my own motives are pure...
Yes, well, I appreciate the concern, ~catnoir~. I'm resolved to see this through to the end, although I may not do so with much bravado...
Well, at least the floor is not sticky. At least, where my feet are at the moment is not sticky. I'm still a bit fearful of taking a step.
Well, I guess there's no avoiding dirtying my feet now.
Sand is a bit hot for bare feet, to be honest. Perhaps if I dig my feet in, I can find some cooler sand...
If I lose much else, I'll be up on this roof in naught but my bathing suit. 'Tis not a situation I expected to be facing...
This is certainly not the venue I expected to be playing on when I wore this...
Well, at least the grass is pleasant neath my feet. A "silver lining," as they say.
Okay, the floor is ice cold. ~Player~, had I known you would invite me to such a place I'd have worn my usual attire...
Yes... well... I didn't really own a bathing suit. I asked Lyse to help me pick one out and she... well, she may have twisted my arm some...
Gods, why did I ask Lyse to help me find a bathing suit? I should have just asked Tataru to make one. She would have made it... bigger...
It beggars belief that Lyse called this "tastefully modest." She spoke such words of praise when I wore it that I... forgot to object...
I'd like to reiterate that I am on vacation, relaxing. I am wearing this for my leisure, not so you might ogle me.

Hm, the floor is cleaner than I expected. There is a surprising lack of, well, stickiness.
I suppose I'm glad the ground here is not muddy or damp.
The small silver lining here is the sand is far more pleasant against my skin than through my socks.
I rather enjoy the feeling of grass underfoot, though present circumstances have doused my enthusiasm for it.
Splendid, now I must watch out for bird droppings...
Hard, rough, and cold. As if things weren't unpleasant enough.
At least we're at the beach where... this sort of thing... is not helping me...
Beaches are for swimwear... not undergarments...
I had hoped being in this state of undress on the beach would be as if I were in my bathing suit, but in all honesty I do not feel that way at all.
The dress code here appears to be swimwear... but even so...

Might be good to practice swimming at any rate. I'd not like to end up like Urianger or Alphinaud.
Lyse and Alisaie were blessed by the Kojin to be able to swim underwater indefinitely. When I go swimming, I can manage maybe a minute with my head under.
I am an okay swimmer. The scion's skills range from those who are literally undrownable and those who do naught but drown. It has become a sore subject among us.
I may be blind, but harsh sunlight still harms my eyes. I still need them to see using the ambient aether, so I must needs take care of them.
In case you were wondering, these are ordinary sunglasses. They don't impede my ability to see aether, but they do protect my eyes from the sun.
My aetheric sight requires the use of my eyes still, so protecting them from sun damage is still a must.
It felt small while I was wearing it, but now that it's off it feels like quite the difference.
I suppose the value was not in how much it covered but in what that little coverage managed to hide.
The excitement was a bit much just having to wear it, but taking it off really has my heart racing...
If any of you have designs to take this because of the gemstones, you will be sorely disappointed should the glamour dispel.
No precious gems to be found here, mind you. The appearance of this necklace has been magically altered via a glamour.
I should point out this necklace is actually quite cheap. Any appearance of luxury is due to a glamour spell.
Upon my return, Tataru was kind enough to prepare these clothes for not just me, but Urianger and Thancred as well.
Of course Tataru, blessing that she is, was able to furnish me with clothing identical to those I had in the First. It made coming back just a bit easier.
I couldn't bring my clothes from the First with me, but our ever industrious receptionist Tataru was able to make replacements.
I'd very much like to see them all again. Mayhap if I can unravel some of the secrets of The Inventory's extra-dimensional properties, I could make my way back to the First.
The Source and the First are as separate as any of our respective worlds, but if The Inventory could bring us together then mayhap it could reunite me with The Night's Blessed.
I hoped I could see the Night's Blessed again, but alas The Inventory guards her secrets jealously. More research is required before I might go between worlds.
Okay, be calm, Shtola... it's not more than you'd show off at the beach... if ever you took your leisure at the beach...
I keep thinking I've worn less on the beach, but it continues to not comfort me. Can we continue so I may cease thinking about it?

Perhaps one glimpse up my skirt would have been less embarrassing than jumping about like that. I will just need to avoid losing from now on.

Care to stay and perhaps lose more, ~target~? Or mayhap your luck will turn right around.
I hope your luck improves, ~target~. Of course, so long as it does not turn upon me.
If you're sticking around, ~target~, I guess that means we will be seeing more of you.
The mystery of ~target~ is unraveling before us, quite literally almost.
Steel yourself for the next round.
You think this isn't ended for you, but it's the same for me.
I must secure victory again. The price of defeat is far too steep.
I've a feeling I can triumph over ~target~ in this next round as well.
I don't like losing all that much, but the idea of winning is terribly enticing.
It just goes to show you can still be beat. Of course, it's the same for me, obviously.
If you're continuing, ~target~, keep in mind that while luck can be fickle it can also be terrifyingly consistent.
Yes, yes, the game shall continue without your ~clothing~ much like it continues despite me.
No remedy for it, save for ~target~ to lose once more.
I suppose if the tables were turned, I wouldn't feel much remorse.
Florina! 'Tis only an insect, no harm will come to you!
'Tis a harmless insect, Florina. You're not in any danger!
Hm? S-Shantae? Your body... what happened?
I know my sight is not what it used to be, but I could not have possibly just seen Shantae turn into... a monkey?
W-What in the world?
I had wondered if you planned to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off at all.
See, if it were me I'd have taken that off before I bared myself.
At this point, I do believe you can strip off what you please with impunity.
The difference between our sensibilities could not be clearer.
I'm assuming ~target~ has their priorities straight, but I cannot see where waiting to make this move was well advised.
Your decisions continue to vex me...
A most unfortunate blow to your defenses, ~target~.
The stakes are only going to get higher, ~target~.
Your ~clothing~, while flattering, must now be sacrificed.
Oh, giving us a glimpse of something nice?
It's a pity. ~clothing.ifPlural(They are|It is a)~ nice ~clothing~.
That will do fine if it is your choice, ~target~.
Any advantage you lose over me is a welcome change.
If I was in your place, I'd likely make the same move.
With your ~clothing~ gone, my odds are at least slightly better.
Given my situation, it's hard to think about this from a perspective of other than how this bodes for my own chances to win.
Considering where I am, ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ no big deal. Although, were our roles reversed I would likely make the exact same move.
Just your ~clothing~? It's alright, but even though I did not lose it does make me feel as if I am going to lose...
I'd been hoping for a windfall this round, but I suppose I'll have to work a bit more for that.
Is that really the safest move you can make right now?
I see you're in no rush to lose.
Be forewarned, ~target~. Your luck may go with your ~clothing~.
A familiar? Is that what that is? It seemed reluctant to approach the group, so I had figured twas not a threat.
Her socks exploded. Her socks exploded? Why did her socks explode and are you okay, Shimakaze?
If exposing yourself early was some sort of mind game to win, I'm not so sure it has worked as you would have liked.
Well, I'll not say there's no difference from before, but I'm sure it will go unnoticed for now.
So long as you're having fun, right ~target~?
Ah, apologies. I don't mean to laugh. It's just so strange I could not help it, even in my state.
Oh dear, there is a part of me that wishes I were as brave as you, but I shall choose to ignore that...
Mayhap I should not question your choices. 'Tis not like I am in any position to preach about decency.
Now then, let's see what else can be lost.
If we're all satisfied, then we may proceed.
I imagine there will be more to see in the coming rounds.
Careful, ~target~. If you're not careful this game with extract a much higher toll from you.
And just like that we're on to the next round.
If you're resolved to stay then mind your choices in the coming rounds, ~target~.
If you're staying, you must think you can best me. Sounds like an exciting challenge.
There will be plenty of time to admire in the next round.
I will not be found lacking, not again.
I can only endeavor to maintain my place.
Apologies, ~target~, but I must continue playing in earnest.
I mustn't go easy on you, ~target~, so long as you're playing.
Sticking around, ~target~? Just know that I'm not going easy on anybody.
Don't think I'll let your luck turn around, ~target~. I'm still playing to win.
The outcome of the next round need not be unfortunate for you, ~target~. Just think carefully.
Through it all, luck remains your greatest ally. Pray only that you remain her only ally.
If you're afraid of losing, then now's the time to muster your courage.
How fascinating! I've scarce seen anything like this back on the Source or out in the First.
So, you would give us something other than your aplomb to admire?
Don't think you have to show off just because there's a woman watching, ~target~.
Short on options or large on mettle? We need only look at ~target~ to know.
This is what those who play this game are seeking to encounter, right?
Doing us a favor, ~target~?
Oh? Quite the treat for us.
Ah-ha, you spoil us, ~target~.
Quite a bit of excitement surrounding this move. Can't you tell?
Mayhap it's unfair to foist upon you that which I so fervently wish to avoid...
I mustn't over think things here. This is another ilm towards victory.
Though it seems a major blow, I mustn't relax quite yet.
Quite the loss, ~target~. I'm more confident now that I could defeat you.
Seems events may work out in my favor after all.
Well, 'tis somewhat enticing, if I'm being honest. Still, I must focus on winning.
Can you afford to lose that?
You needn't be embarrassed, ~target~. Believe me.
Would you feel more comfortable if I looked away?

I see. This small creature was responsible for your previous aetheric properties, that much is clear now. By combining your essence, one becomes enhanced while the other becomes stabilized. Fascinating...
Can't say I've ever seen the Garlean war machina do that before.
I know it might be embarrassing, but I'm certain nobody thinks less of you, ~target~.
Continuing, ~target~? Are you sure that's wise?
What I most admire is your resolve to continue, ~target~.
Don't feel compelled to stay on our account, ~target~. No guarantee your luck won't sour further.
Brave of you to stick around, ~target~. Let's see what more we can have you lose.
Glad you'll stick around, ~target~. I'm sure you've more to show us.
I won't quit either. I'll see this through until the end.
If you want to back out now ~target~, I'd gladly join you.
We stand to lose so much, and yet we choose to press on...
I don't even need to guess at what is compelling you to stay.
I'll admit I've remained to play due to my being a bit of a sore loser, but I wonder what's keeping ~target~ in this game.
I get the feeling both ~target~ and I are going to need a stiff drink after all is said and done.
Maybe your luck will turn around, ~target~. Seeing your loss though has me confident I could defeat you with a bit of effort.
Don't think of yourself as undressed but rather... liberated.
Don't worry too much about losing, ~target~. Your objective is to win, so focus on that.
It won't get any easier from here on out, so stay positive, ~target~.
Virgo, is it? She seems different than the egis I have seen, nearly as if she were a complete person.
Turning into a viera? That's quite the feat unto itself.
It's your choice, Emi. Your resolve to win is beyond admirable.
Ha, well, if you're comfortable with it, Emi, I don't see how we could object.
Twelve preserve!
Oh no, Shimakaze!
Shimakaze is quite sturdy for a girl her size...
Unfortunately, Saki, 'twould seem you've been backed into a bit of a corner. Will it be the top or the bottom this time?
My, my. Quite the creative setups you have, Akko.
Do the other mages of your circle specialize in this sort of thing or is this your specialty in particular, Akko?
I do not envy your position, ~target~. You get full marks for bravery.
My, this game is nerve-wracking. I apologize for this, ~target~.
Ah, I shouldn't laugh. I fair no better when put in your position..
Oh, a bold choice, ~target~.
I'm sure nobody here would mind seeing a bit more of your body, ~target~.
A little more of ~target~ will be coming to light.
Very well, let's have it then!
The idea of solidarity carries a slight comfort with it.
A pity this game takes no prisoners.
If you don't freak out, I may freak out for you...
So, we shall both be overexposed, ~target~. Mayhap we should hide behind one another?
Seems we're both having a run of poor luck, or perhaps even poor judgment.
Hopefully this will more evenly distribute the stares being passed round.
Remain strong, ~target~.
This is not an easy part of the game for any of us, ~target~.
My stomach was already in knots by the time I got down to your level, ~target~.
Oh, egi most definitely do not do that to their summoners.
Oh, it's been a ruse all along? 'Tis nice to know, but it's not like I wasn't playing best I could from the first.
Your ruse seems to have payed off, even if just a bit. It does not seem wise to reveal this now that you're at this critical stage.
I had been thinking you were more experienced than you were letting on. Seems your plot got the better of me.
I see, well, you've nothing to fear from me. I've not the slightest who I would even tell.
Your identity is your business. I would dream of letting it slip, even if I knew who to tell.
Still, unless your luck turns around quickly this will be an ultimately fruitless effort.
If fortune does indeed favor the bold, Emi might secure victory; however, luck remains an ever fickle companion.
Seems you've been through something unpleasant...
I've seen my fair share of scars and wounds during my life. I understand the unpleasantness of it all...
Are you daft? Such weapons are not toys!
By the Twelve, can you really be okay after taking such a direct hit?
Oh dear... you do appear unharmed this time. Please say something if you are hurt...
Shimakaze, you don't have to keep playing if the game is going to be so dangerous for you!
'Twould seem your undergarments leave little to the imagination.
... Or you could do that?
If I'm not being too forward, seems like you have something worth flaunting.
Keep playing and perhaps you'll get your revenge.
It's no more than a stranger might see at a beach or a bath house. Thoughts like these bring me a spot of security.
Whether fortunately or unfortunately for you, your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ off and the world has not ended.
Seems you've been taking care of yourself. No shame in that.
The women here always have such nice bodies. 'Tis almost flattery that I am here among them.
I hope no one will have issue concentrating on the game with ~target~ in such a state.
This is good for me, but our business has not yet concluded.
This has all been more exciting than I can handle...
This is an ilm, nay, a fulm in the right direction.
Seeing you lose such an important piece makes me feel as though I just might pull this whole thing off.
The excitement is palpable, yes, but so is the terror.
I'm still determined to win. To come this far and lose would simply be a shame.
Can't deny your determination, ~target~. Despite being set against one another, we are in this together.
This game is ruthless all the way until the end...
Passing strange that your position now seems enviable to me.
Your most pressing concern should be your next round.
Is that the ordinance from earlier?
S-super w-wigging what?!
W-what? Gods!
Ah, the ordinance from before is!
That is some foreboding aether...
Don't men walk around with their shirts off regularly? I'd hardly call this risque.
Oh, your bare chest? Forgive me if my feigned excitement is unconvincing.
My, my, quite the roguish move.
A man with a bare chest in public? More tasteful than daring, I must say.
Seems to me men doff their shirts with nary an excuse under normal circumstances.
Do not complain of your losses to me, ~target~. For men, a bare chest is no different from having visible ankles.
I do not wish to hear any complaints about this, ~target~. Most men I know avoid wearing shirts.
Doffing your ~clothing~ then? Amazing how men will expose their chests and then strut about like it's some big deal.
Let us not pretend any man showing his chest is equal to a woman showing hers.
Hold on, ~target~, your ~clothing~? Oh, I-I suppose that's not a big deal.
Having your ~clothing~ off shouldn't bother me, but in this context...
Oh, this is wrong... so very, very wrong...
What you need, nay, what you lack is some essential dignity. That much is clear.
What you need is a cure or two or three for whatever ails that mind of yours.
To rend the asylum of your own clothes, especially in this game, indicates to me your problem requires something beyond healing.
Something hit me in the face. I pray it was a piece of your jacket and not one of your hairs.
I've not the time to explain to you the myriad of things that were wrong with that.
Bobobo you are either brilliant beyond comprehension or an unparalleled dullard. As a rational person, I'm inclined to think it's the latter.

I've no idea what a "Shadow Game" is, but if you're still set on leaving then I would encourage you to simply go. Whatever force destroyed your shirt likely just wanted to make sure you made good on the bet.
You must be awfully proud of yourself.
I'm not particularly impressed, but I'm very nearly always around some very fit people.
Yes, your muscles are nice, but they are obscured by how terrible you are at cards.
Do your muscles serve some purpose? I mean beyond attempting to impress us.
These sorts of things are nice too.
Extra weight has oft been a sign of prosperity, but too often do we sacrifice health for prosperity.
How does the saying go? "There is more to love?"
Women have told me heavier men are better for a tender embrace, but I have not had such an occasion.
A bit on the lean side, aren't we?
I suppose food is no vice of yours, ~target~.
I mean no offense, but I have half a mind to buy you a meal, ~target~. Do you like eel pie?
You're built like a friend of mine, Urianger. Ladies like him well enough, if that matters to you.
I've other things on my mind, thank you.
If there is aught here I should take pleasure in, I fail to see it.
I'm in no mood to gawk or jeer at such things.
My only remedy is an end to this game, so take up your cards and ready yourself for failure.
It's not that I dislike seeing such things, but over the years I've had my fill.
When I have decided to swoon, I'll send a missive.
See? You've nothing you must needs hide from me.
Perhaps a bit unremarkable, but that is not all together a bad thing.
Well... what could be wrong with that?
Hmm, maybe a bit of a chill...
Actually, I don't miss the ~clothing~.
In the grand scheme of things, 'twould be best if I made my own way. My goal is not to be a tourist, but to open the way betwixt mine own world and the rest.
So, what can we expect this time? Yet more underwear? Another visit from one of your esteemed companions?
Well? We're all waiting.
Little boys and their little toys...
Oh, don't be cruel, Shtola. You'd be inconsolable in his shoes.
I know you're likely worried, ~target~, but you surely needn't. The rest of us have that covered.
I cannot promise I will not laugh, and I doubly apologize in advance should that come to pass.
This just means you're that much closer to losing.
I should have anticipated something like this, but I suppose I did not want to...
Is it too much to hope the sight of your penis will not further embarrass me?
Winning has its costs too, I suppose.
Shtola, why do you not look away?
~target~'s knob is going to pop out of his ~clothing~ and then I just know we'll make eye contact and after that I am quite unsure!
H-hold on! I have... several misgivings!
I... know not what I should look at...
... Perhaps we'd best move on.
I... well... I lack the sentiment to ameliorate this situation.
Well, now we've all seen it. Further comment would be cruel.
I hope I do not overstep when I say that this is ultimately not the measure of a lover.
Ah, yes, I am reminded we all have things we'd rather keep hidden.
Oh... well... erm...
You may not want my pity, but regretfully you have it.
No, no words can remedy this. I choose silence.
Ooooh... oh no...
I-I am not looking! I did not look! I've nothing to say!
Hoooh, Shtola is having a bad day...
Don't say anything, Shtola, just avert your gaze...
Wait, you'd lose on purpose? Just to do... erm, that? With all of us here?
Your attachment to your hat, while touching, may ultimately lead to your downfall; however, 'tis your choice to make.
Aye, well, 'tis your funeral after all. You're free to fail on your own terms if it means so much to you.
Seems a waste. If you hand it here, I would gladly don it for an extra layer.
I daresay I don't see the benefit to retaining your hat, but I'll not be the first to compel you to lose any slower.
You mean, you want to lose? Even with all of us here?
So, this is the most honest part of you?
Well, he is handsome as far as knobs go.
To my fellow players, I present you this: a man.
~target~'s thoughts may be unknown to us, but this may serve to enlighten us.
I know you may be unable to help it, but if I see that move I may flee this place.
How will I focus on playing with that thing staring at me?
You must understand: I had hoped to be wearing more clothes before I encountered your exposed manhood.
I mean no disrespect, ~target~, but from now on let's refrain from eye contact.
Hah, oh! J-just ignore me.
Makes a girl wonder...
I suppose... looking is harmless...
Ah, oh, was that a chill I felt?
Oh? Undercutting the tension with a come-on instead of a punchline? A rather bold change in tactics for a man with all of that exposed.
Well pivoted, Bobobo, but I had enough trouble taking your come-ons seriously when you were fully dressed.
Gah! T-that was the only thing I wasn't expecting!
Oh! Or just your penis? I nearly forgot that could happen.
That is absolutely ridiculous!
Come now, is this some sort of jest?
Ah ha-ha! Oh, n-no! I'm sorry, but just-just look at that thing! It seems impossible!
Ho-ho, no! Those poor girls!
Is... is this some sort of put-on?
Oh, no... I mustn't look! It would be far too rude to laugh.
You cannot be serious. You simply... cannot be serious.
Oh? Is this the source of your confidence? You poor thing.
Ah-ha-ha! N-n-no! Put it away! I-I cannot continue w-while I am laughing!
... That's not real, right? I mean, it's simply not feasible...
Ah-ha-ha! Oh-ha-ha-ha! P-please tell me-he you're joking! Ah-ha-ha!
Well, just looking at that is painful.
By the Twelve, such heat!
Florina, I'm sure it's more scared of you than you are of... actually, that seems unlikely...
Florina, just breath and be still. It will likely leave you alone if you do!
Oh my, ahem... oh dear? Polly no? Come back? Ah, I do not want to give away the ruse...
Oh, Saki! Are you okay?
That one looked especially bad!
You're just full of surprises, aren't you, Akko?
I take no pleasure in your humiliation, but I'd be lying if I said I was not curious.
For what it's worth, I admire your courage, ~target~.
I cannot promise I will fully avert my eyes, but I will endeavor not to stare overmuch.
Honestly, you should not take your ease of this game if you'd like to avoid this predicament.
Modesty is a virtue, ~target~, but unfortunately gambling is a vice.
Seems bad luck has made a spectacle of us both.
I would be immensely grateful for any attention you could direct away from me.
If anyone should make fun of you, ~target~, do not forget I can freeze the hairs off their flesh.
Between the pair of us, oh- perhaps I should not say "pair."
I am compelled to remind you I did not bring this occasion to bear out of some ill will I bear towards you.
All I can think is perhaps everyone will look away from me for two seconds.
We've fallen quite a ways, haven't we ~target~.
If it makes you feel better, ~target~, I will threaten to incinerate anyone who laughs.
Good, she's still unharmed. 'Tis a shame such a cute girl has to explode at all.
They suit you quite nicely, ~target~.
Beauty is not built in onzes of flesh, ~target~. It blossoms in the mind of an observer.
As practical as they are cute, ~target~.
Very adorable, ~target~. I'm quite envious.
'Twould be easier to shield myself if mine were that size.
Ultimately the only aspect of a woman's chest that draws unwanted attention is that it is indeed a woman's chest.
I hope you bear no misgivings about your bosom, ~target~. Scores of women would kill for what you have.
I may be undressed, but I can still call the lightning down on whomsoever makes untoward comments to ~target~.
You are quite lovely, ~target~. Full marks.
Aside from your nudity, I'd say you've nothing to be ashamed of.
Mayhap it would be self serving to say, but this group is remarkably attractive all around.
You'd think a place like this would be filled with gruff dastards, but then there are cute girls like ~target~ here. 'Tis passing strange...
My word, you could give Ifrit a run for his money.
I am sorry, Polly. You can fool everyone else with a trick of the light, but the aether of your body is another matter entirely.
You'd be the envy of all Eorzea, ~target~.
Oh, very well, I am compelled to stare just a tiny bit.
You've a fine figure, ~target~.
The whole of the Inventory no doubt delights at your very presence.
I do believe you are drawing stares from beyond our table...
I'm playing as hard as I can to avoid further embarrassment. I am ashamed it comes at such high cost to you.
If you agreed to play, you must have known this was a possibility; although, the same could be said for me...
I know not what it's worth, but your figure is quite flattering.
Well, that's not a bad look on you.
I'd say you've got a tasteful figure, ~target~.
I bet you're considered quite the catch where you hail from.
I understand you might be embarrassed, so I hope it helps to know we are all thoroughly impressed.
Ah, using arcanum to alter a bosom? I don't mean to laugh, but it's just... well, very ridiculous.
Oh dear, that's not a glamour. I don't think I've ever seen someone use their arcane arts to such a thing.
I mean, I could estimate the size even with your ~clothing~ on, but seeing them out in the open is quite something.
Is it rude to ask if you are popular with the men in your world?
Oh my, I'd say you have me beat!
Do you have some Roegadyn blood on your mother's side?
Your poor ~clothing~. I believe ~clothing.ifPlural(they have|it has)~ earned a reprieve.
I would be beyond hope to shield my bosom were mine so ample.
This sort of size verges on problematic.
I've seen Roegadyn women with the selfsame bust, but all of them were far taller and robust than you or I.
I knew they would be considerable, but seeing them is still...
I pray that those are not unmanageable for you.
I hope the men of your world do not make themselves too much of a nuisance for you.
Your offerings are so very different from mine...
A woman's bosom radiates a strange gravity that draws in even one's gaze...
I see our familiar friend is returned to us...
Stay strong, Shimakaze!
Quite the performance, Akko. You get full marks for that.
The excitement is palpable here, ~target~.
If you must bare your womanhood, do so secure in the knowledge that each one is a little odd looking.
I think the thing we'll admire most is your aplomb.
Take your time if you need to, ~target~.
If you're willing to go this far to win, then you have my respect.
The price of loss in this game only becomes more steep.
If it comforts you at all, I can avert my gaze while your undress.
Such an asinine game...
I know it seems unfair to you, ~target~, but I could tolerate a little solidarity.
By the game's design, this table grows increasingly indecent.
Everyone here has seen mine, so I'm sure showing yours will be less of an upset.
That's an embarrassment I know all to well by now.
By the Twelve... it's just like Amaurot...
Your abuse of ordinance would offend the machinists of Ishgard just as much as your perversion would offend her priests. Not a proud accomplishment.
Please tell me the end of her clothes means the end of the explosions? I just can't imagine what will happen now that she's exposed like this...
Yes, well, there it is. What more can one say?
Now, now, let's refrain from any vulgarities. ~target~ is still a person with feelings.
Take care what you do with your hands, ~target~. Who knows what sort of blights cover this place...
By the Twelve, this game is quite asinine...
I shall see this through, even if it should make me a hypocrite.
Eyes forward, Shtola. The game is not over yet.
As long as you're still in this game, ~target~, I'm afraid I must continue to push you lower.
I can only proffer another apology as I prepare again to take you down.
We make a shameful pair, ~target~.
You'll see this through, ~target~, with your head up higher than mine.
Better play to win, ~target~. That's my advice for you.
By the Twelve, is this not why this game is ever played? How asinine...
After what we endured in the first, I'd be surprised if there was a light pun I'd not yet heard.
Three in a row, ~target~? It's not a good look.
Need a refresher on the rules, ~target~?
Two losses would seem bad luck, but three is a pattern, ~target~.
Unless this is some sort of elaborate ruse, at least we know ~target~ is not cheating...
Oh dear, ~target~. You're having a run of it, I'd wager.
I would chalk that up to bad luck, ~target~.
The odds continue to be against you.
Another loss, ~target~. Perhaps you should reevaluate your strategy.
You're not getting psyched out, are you, ~target~?
What do you think, ~target~? Is the challenge too much for you?
Mayhap ~target~ just wants to lose?
What are the odds? Does someone have it out for ~target~?
Really? Again? You must needs try harder.
~target~, this becoming troublesome...
No surprise there, I suppose.
You do realize what happens when you lose, right?
Someone here isn't cheating to sabotage ~target~, right?
You can't actually just be this bad at the game, right ~target~?
The first few times were funny, but the joke's wearing thin...
Is there some reason why this is happening?
I don't intend to let up, ~target~. I shall be victorious.
I'm determined to win now, ~target~. It's nothing personal.
There is an element of strategy and forethought needed for this game, ~target~. That is how I plan to win.
One loss was not going to be sufficient, ~target~. Not if I'm going to win.
'Tis all part of the plan that you should continue to lose so that I may win.
Have I not made my intentions to win clear? You'll not beat me, ~target~.
I'm resolved to stay, but I'd advise you, ~target~, that now may be the time to walk away.
I'm playing to win, ~target~. I believe I warned you.
I said I would win, ~target~. I am merely seeing that through.
Good, this shall chip away at ~target~'s defenses.
~target~, you could afford that loss. You'll have another if I can help it.
Aye, serves ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ right.
Ah-haha! Victory is mine! You'll take the fall in my place, ~target~!
There. That is how Y'shtola Rhul disposes of rubbish.
Apologies, ~target~. Try not to let this discourage you. There is plenty of time for your luck to turn around.
Someone must be the first to lose, and 'tis a shame it had to be you, ~target~.
Don't think this a bad omen, ~target~. Luck is as often fickle with her curses as her blessings.
By Hydaelyn!
Such recklessness!
Gods, not again!
Ack! Much too close!
I've half a mind not to heal you, Aimee, should you injure yourself like this...
No matter how skilled a machinist you are, this is still beyond inadvisable...
Aimee, enough of this! Someone is going to get hurt!

state.text: Leaning into your predicament, Haru? That takes guts I scarce possess.

case.state: Chihiro! Wait! What's wrong?
If you were determined to hide this, it explains your earlier hesitance to undress
Quite the surprise, Chihiro. I'm sure you had your reasons for the deception.
I'd not categorize what ~target~ and ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ partner as masturbation, but perhaps I'm getting hung up on the semantics...
The pair of them are really going at it...
My, that's a bold offer. 'Twould certainly make our relationship quite a bit more intimate...
Why, Bobobo, that is a rather brazen request. I must say, it does find me at odds...
Perhaps poker is not your game, ~target~.
Oh, ~target~, I shall have to avert my gaze...
That is quite the shame, is it not?
Well, we know what comes next. Ah, I should mind my words.
Okay, that is one out of the way.
Yes, yes! This is good! This is very good!
Ah! I did not lose! One less opponent left to vanquish!
With that, the task is cleared.
Ah, poor ~target~...
My condolences, ~target~...
I hope you're not upset, ~target~...
But I'm a stickler for the rules, and you'd hardly be interested in a schmuck like me.
But maybe it won't be all bad for you...
